body: LGTM

For broadcasting message model, consumers are assumed to store offsets on their own through LocalOffsetStore. Developers may also implement OffsetStore interface and save offsets to central storage at their own discretion.
no slave benchmark is much more higher than m-s framework.

@githublaohu RocketMQ5.0计划什么时候release？

@zhuwt1996 第一个问题，有没有相关的日志来说明一下这个问题呢？rollback的消息应该不会再被消费的，你是不是在console的网页上看到的，那个是因为console网页有些问题。第二个问题，你是不是使用了spring的@transaction注解，抛出异常倒是数据库回滚，后续建议使用RocketMQ的[邮件列表](https://rocketmq.apache.org/about/contact/)来反应问题，里面有很多小伙伴回答问题，也有助于我们沉淀下来。

@liukun4515 RocketMQ client runs with the user's code，so In order to ensure that the lower version can be used normally for users' code, it is still 1.6 in the logging.
and @lemonzone2010 comment, Ask this question by using the mailing list. http://rocketmq.apache.org/about/contact/
@sailliu as @lizhanhui comment, broadcasting message model currently used local offset store to save the consume offset in broadcasting message model.

thanks!
@lemonzone2010 @duhenglucky

@duhengforever , thanks for your feedback. Actually I also have the same idea to implementation my own AllocateMessageQueueStrategy to select the canary queues. Also it seems we need to implement the MessageSelector based on the same selection algo to distinguish the canary producer. And we need to dynamically twist the ration of canary traffic to exiting production traffic. So this becomes complicated and I do implemented a POC to do that, but it seems not graceful enough. So I am wondering whether there is a existing solution with current RMQ release, unluckily it seems not :( .  I have to improve my solution now. But still thanks for you!

Have the same problem.
A new consumer group will request offset from broker(MessageMode is CLUSTERING), and if the first record of the topic is in commitlog file, then the broker will return 0 and consumer will consume from the start.

@ncl911 欢迎参与到rocketmq社区中,prepare消息每次后移是为了保证位点前进的同时，没有被确认的prepare消息能够保证得到回查响应，而且在队列存储中，永远只有append 操作，所以需要将prepare消息写到下一个位置后发送回查消息，另外，issue只用做bug report 以及feature request，所以咨询类的问题请使用邮件列表：https://rocketmq.apache.org/about/contact/

@hepyu This config used for Unitized deployment，but now, we haven't used this setting to do some real work. and issue only used for bug report or feature request, if you have some question, please subscribe our mailing list and send your question to our email: https://rocketmq.apache.org/about/contact/

@sky-syk you can subscribe multi topics in one consumer group，but please keep subscription info consistent in the same consumer group.  if you have questions about rocketmq, please subscribe to our mailing list and send your question to our email: https://rocketmq.apache.org/about/contact/
@duhenglucky 明白，但是发出了多条一样的消息算不算bug？？

同样问题 tps不到 100
sendMessageThreadPoolNums=64
useReentrantLockWhenPutMessage=true
修改完后， 问题依旧。
thanks @Zanglei06 @duhenglucky

@zongtanghu I have seen many conflicts here, could you please resolve it firstly :-)Another thing, you may merge the develop branch commit into your commit now, could you please squash your commit history locally then push -f ?
@ncl911 为了保证消息不丢失只能选择重复，因为消息不丢不重是做不到的。

> @xox9001 There maybe multi network interfaces in the host, the rocketmq broker will bind to one of them.
> You could use `mqadmin clusterList` to check the binded ip.
> Alternatively, you could config the "brokerIP1" in the conf to have a determinate binding.

i config brokerIP1=192.168.31.152,my cluster only one broker and one namesrv. use code push and consumer no problem,but use mqadmin has error

> @xox9001 There maybe multi network interfaces in the host, the rocketmq broker will bind to one of them.
> You could use `mqadmin clusterList` to check the binded ip.
> Alternatively, you could config the "brokerIP1" in the conf to have a determinate binding.

Alibaba open source flow control framework [Sentinel](https://github.com/alibaba/Sentinel) fits your needs fine. It's *A lightweight flow-control library providing high-available protection and monitoring*. See [限流 匀速器](https://github.com/alibaba/Sentinel/wiki/%E9%99%90%E6%B5%81---%E5%8C%80%E9%80%9F%E5%99%A8) .

> @zongtanghu 恩恩，不过如果 建议 关闭自动创建topic是因为这个原因的话，那我觉得rocketmq对用户可能不太友好。而且正常情况下是能都创建的，既然这样，为什么就不保证在各个情况下都能创建成功呢，这样这个功能也会更加完善

同样的疑问，不知后面你是通过何种方式实现自动创建topic到集群下所有的broker
@2259289435 目前我们是在控制台直接修改，将Topic扩展到多个master节点上面。自己考虑的几种方式1、在控制台上创建Topic 2、producer和consumer以及admin API里面其实有创建Topic API，应用启动时将对应的Topic初始化就可以了 3、还有一种方式就是设计更合理的自动创建方式，这个就需要修改源码重新打包

> @2259289435 目前我们是在控制台直接修改，将Topic扩展到多个master节点上面。自己考虑的几种方式1、在控制台上创建Topic 2、producer和consumer以及admin API里面其实有创建Topic API，应用启动时将对应的Topic初始化就可以了 3、还有一种方式就是设计更合理的自动创建方式，这个就需要修改源码重新打包

了解，还是采取2自己来控制比较方便。顺序的就单broker，非顺序的可以集群创建，而不是单broker创建。
2的话MQAdminImpl里面的createTopic(key, newTopic, queueNum, topicSysFlag)倒是找到方法了，只是方法上都没有注释
It would be helpful for more guys review in the community if  we could separate the pr to acl and tracing

`MessageDecoder.decodeMessageId(msgId)`  just checks msgId format. If no exception, msgId is just messageId format.Message will be queried by `this.viewMessage(msgId)`. Otherwise it's UniqKey and message will be queried by `queryMessageByUniqKey(topic, msgId)`

if last consumer queue flush success ，logicsMsgTimestamp is 11:14
the new time is
physicMsgTimestamp 11:17
logicsMsgTimestamp = 11:16
indexMsgTimestamp = 11:16
when index file flush , but the 11:16 consumer queue file dont flush .
So may from 11:14 to 11:16 dispatch consumer queue file may loss
@xiangwangcheng You can submit a PR, and show us the code how to do
Can it?

@lemonzone2010  Just delete the code `MessageDecoder.decodeMessageId(msgId);`. 
I will submit a PR.
This gave me a big help !
这个是把消息的存储时间带过来了，dispatch 到consumer queue 的时候，是单线程，这个消息的存储时间是单调递增的。
RocketMQ  4.3.2 Throw this exception throw IllegalStateException: incompatible event loop type: io.netty.channel.nio.NioEventLoop

bossEventGroup should use EpollEventLoopGroup
I also have the same problem,the above parameters have been adjusted and the JVM has been optimized, the problem has not been solved yet.

The key is to tune the JVM. A timeout occurs when the GC STW affects the execution of the thread
if you use G1, Never configure Xmn and -XX:NewRatio

I have configured according to the email, but there is still this problem。

Why should this code be moved? IMO, if the message was sent to the message queue failed or timeout, it is better to send the message to another message queue, otherwise, there's a big possibility to send the message to the queue failed again.
会在recover函数里面进行修复的
